[`Command`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Command.md) â€º [`callback`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Command/callback.md)

## Command.callback property

Simple callback, triggered globally.

**Signature:**

```typescript
callback?: () => any;
```

## Example


```ts
this.addCommand({
  id: 'print-greeting-to-console',
  name: 'Print greeting to console',
  callback: () => {
    console.log('Hey, you!');
  },
});
```
